definition: popular history of China in three volumes by Cao Yuzhang 曹余章

sentences.english: Time Millennium Real Estate Wimberley, Texas.
sentences.chinese: 時代千年房地產威伯利得克薩斯。

sentences.english: We are the country with five-thousand-year culture, old buildings are one of the evidences.
sentences.chinese: 我們是用五千年文化的國家，舊建築物的依據之一。

sentences.english: For whom, for whom, who has waited for eternity in a thousand years?
sentences.chinese: 爲誰傾盡一生，爲誰把千年等待刻成一個永恆？

sentences.english: The world urgently needs the ancient wisdom of the East.
sentences.chinese: 世界需要流傳了數千年之久的東方智慧。

sentences.english: It is said that the old tree has stood here two thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 據說這棵樹已經在這裏活了兩千年了。

sentences.english: Lightsabers have changed little in the thousands of years of their employ by the Jedi Knights.
sentences.chinese: 在絕地武士使用光劍的幾千年裏，光劍的變化不大。

sentences.english: The stone and grass thousands years love, four families with Chang.
sentences.chinese: 頑石幽草千年戀，四大家族衰與昌。

sentences.english: "Taihu Pearl" Wuxi is a three-year history of the southern city.
sentences.chinese: “太湖明珠”無錫是一座具有三千年歷史的江南名城。

sentences.english: Actually, Chinese history of literature is the musical literary history .
sentences.chinese: 歷數中國幾千年文學史，其實是一部音樂文學史。

sentences.english: The earth has been warming for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 幾千年來地球都在不斷增溫。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine has a history of thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 中國醫藥學有着數千年的歷史。

sentences.english: Some sports or games go back thousands of years, like running or jumping.
sentences.chinese: 有些運動或運動會追溯到幾千年，如跑步或跳躍。

sentences.english: No one can stop what our fathers and forefathers have done for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人能夠阻止我們父親和祖先在幾千年前所做的。

sentences.english: Holy stream temple has more than ten outlet through millennium still limpid.
sentences.chinese: 聖泉寺中有十多個出水口，歷經千年依然清澈。

sentences.english: This feudal society, beginning with Zhou and Qin Dynasties. lasted about 3000 years.
sentences.chinese: 這個封建社會，從周秦開始，延續了約三千年。

sentences.english: Xinjiang Karez back in the Han Dynasty two thousand years ago, there were problems of its shape.
sentences.chinese: 新疆的坎兒井早在兩千年前的漢代即出現其雛形。

definition: Wannian county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
lit. the blue sea turned into mulberry fields (idiom)/fig. the transformations of the world
Wanzai county in Yichun 宜春, Jiangxi
throughout time/from ancient times (up to the present)
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
since the dawn of time/from the year dot
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
to have been through the hardships of life/to have been through the mill
